head.supplied: ¶ [...] ¶ ¶ I have to thank you for sending me photo. of the late Baron's grave. ¶ ¶ From your letter I infer that you are aware of my having written to your Government relative to the supplementar...

div.p: From Frederick Bailey to Charles French
Letter press copy book 3, p. 694, Queensland Herbarium, Brisbane.
I have to thank you for sending me photo. of the late Baron's grave.

From your letter I infer that you are aware of my having written to your Government relative to the supplementary volume of the flora as you say the MSS is largely prepared. I may mention that Mr Luehmann in a letter received about the same time as yours informed me that it has only proceeded to the end of Thalamiflorae, and that the Baron had not revised it. You will see that not more than a 12th of the MSS is done, and this has taken 3 years to do. I was to have it ready for the press in 2 years, but gave up at the Baron's request. I cannot see how you can consider it the Baron's property to leave to another, but think that, being now senior botanist of Australia, I should naturally complete it.
